title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that lets you use any Ollama model as a drop-in LLM for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel but runs entirely local via Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK providing type-safe wrappers and reactive streams for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based TUI that adds fuzzy-finder model switching, chat history, and markdown rendering on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Org collecting IDE extensions: vscode-ollama, jetbrains-ollama, neovim-ollama for local AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes showing how to chain Ollama with FastAPI, NextJS, Tauri, Flutter, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Python CLI that mimics official OpenAI chat CLI but proxies to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models into servers with slash commands, moderation, and per-user quotas.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for the Ollama REST API with async/await and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module that spins up Ollama service containers for integration tests of LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK targeting .NET 6+ with strongly-typed request/response models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing tokio-based client plus CLI example for managing and chatting with models.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from OpenAPI spec; supports context cancellation and jsoniter for speed.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert & quantize Hugging Face transformers into GGUF format and push directly to Ollama model registry.
